Coloring Shapes was created with a unique mission: to nurture the love of art and bring quality coloring experiences to everyone. We want to connect users with beautiful and interesting drawings that are highly appreciated by the art-loving community.
Coloring Shapes is developed by a team of passionate art lovers. We are independent individuals, not affiliated with any organization, agency or company.

‚Ä¢ Coloring Shapes provides coloring drawings completely free.\n\n‚Ä¢ All drawings in our app are provided completely free. However, to enhance the coloring experience and support artists, we encourage you to support the authors of the drawings you love.

Drawings in Coloring Shapes are collected from many sources available on the internet, including art websites, coloring communities, and many other sources.\n\nDue to collection from many different sources, there may sometimes be omissions or inaccuracies in content. We appreciate your understanding and always welcome feedback to help us improve and fix these issues promptly.

‚Ä¢ If you are the copyright owner of any content on Coloring Shapes and want to remove that content, please email us at support@coloring-shapes.com. We will remove the content immediately after receiving your request.\n\n‚Ä¢ Since our library is still developing, we continuously search for new drawings to share with users. If you have specific content requests, please email us, and we will do our best to find and provide drawings as requested as quickly as possible.
We wish you relaxing, comfortable and beneficial coloring moments with Coloring Shapes.
145 Dien Bien Phu, Ward 2, Binh Thanh, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
‚Ä¢ System: Automatically follow system settings\n‚Ä¢ Light: Always use light theme\n‚Ä¢ Dark: Always use dark theme
